Organization fundamentals Know the purpose of USGBC and what its goals are. What is the mission of USGBC? USGBC’s mission is “to transform the way buildings and communities are designed, built, and operated, enabling an environmentally and socially responsible, healthy, and prosperous environment that improves the quality of life”.
